name: Fly with Friends
description:
CONTROLS

WASD - Move Arm

Space   -  Interact Button (Press Button / Hold Lever)

(Player 2 Local Co-Op)

Arrow Keys - Move Arm

" . "                     - Interact Button (Press Button / Hold Lever)

Tip! To move the lever up down / side to side, hold the Interact button while moving the hand in the desired direction!
